There’s no avoiding the truth: the #ClimateCrisis is affecting everything. Not just weather & our environment, but public health, the economy, & the disparity between the world’s richest & poorest communities.

We need to take action before it’s too late. https://www.cnn.com/2019/06/25/world/climate-apartheid-poverty-un-intl/index.html?utm_source=hive&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=hive_email_id_33883&h_sid=cfe12d0797-5a9442a8fcec5966695272df …

Bush shows abortions actually *increased* because clinics all over the world were forced to close & contraception was no longer available for women who needed it https://www.newscientist.com/article/2208034-when-us-pulls-overseas-abortion-funding-abortion-rates-go-up-not-down/ …

The cruel treatment they have suffered goes against our American values & all human decency. My vote is for the children. https://www.npr.org/2019/06/27/736721020/house-passes-senate-version-of-new-funding-to-ease-border-crisis …

This is a win for our country: #SCOTUS blocked the use of an unconstitutional citizenship question – a partisan weapon that would have reduced the accuracy of Census&disenfranchised vulnerable communities. We will keep fighting to ensure all Americans are counted & represented. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1144258499414777856 …
On this National #HIVTestingDay, take control of your health & get tested. It’s easy to find a testing location near you in South Florida!  https://npin.cdc.gov/nhtd/

This week, @HouseDemocrats will pass comprehensive election security legislation. The #SAFEAct includes measures that will:

✅ modernize our election systems
✅ authorize new funds to improve election infrastructure 
✅ ensure the accuracy and integrity of our elections

Marriage equality, decriminalizing same-sex couples,& overturning DOMA.

These three important #SCOTUS decisions were all decided June 26th. Let’s officially make it #LGBTQEqualityDay, celebrating how much progress we've made & recommitting to continue to fight for #LGBTQ rights. pic.twitter.com/Ca2FtMexFU
Everyone in South Florida, including those in the #LGBTQ community, deserves to seen & included. I’m proud to support the LGBTQ Data Inclusion Act in order to make this a reality. #BeVisible

Sending love to my brave friend & colleague @RepSusanWild. Your powerful story touches us all, and we’re here to support you. It’s up to everyone to make sure removing the stigma is more than just a slogan. https://twitter.com/RepSusanWild/status/1143892124703842304 …

Also, reversing Trump’s reckless decision to block assistance to Central American countries. Now, it’s time to fix our broken immigration system by strengthening border security & creating a path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants who work hard & pay taxes.

Children seeking refuge in our country shouldn’t be sleeping on cement floors or living in overcrowded, unsanitary conditions. In 2016, Florida voters were targeted by hackers. With the 2020 elections fast approaching, we must ensure these bad actors never succeed. Helping states secure their election systems is more vital than ever to protecting our national security. #SAFEAct

One person, one vote — regardless of race, income or zip code. Period.

House Democrats will not stop until the promise of our democracy is fulfilled for EVERY American. #ForThePeople pic.twitter.com/AcidxheADg

Great news – today, the House passed a bill to provide $75mil in grants for non-profits & religious institutions to increase security. Recently we’ve seen an alarming rise in hate crimes - including two shootings at synagogues - making this funding crucial to saving lives.

While the President’s safety is paramount, we must minimize the burden for those suffering. I’m pleased my provision for $3.5mil again for a program to assist these businesses was included in the bill which passed committee today.

Since inauguration, Trump has spent almost four full months at Mar-a-Lago in South Florida. When he visits, small business operating at Lantana Airport are completely shut down. They can’t pay their employees or bills, losing more than $1.5 million in revenue so far.

The THUD bill has measures that invest in our infrastructure, strengthen rail travel & make it safer, expand housing assistance grants for homeless people, support women in transportation, &ensure people w/ physical or mental disabilities are not discriminated against in housing.

The Agriculture funding bill includes provisions I supported to expand nutrition assistance for low-income students, fund options for domestic violence survivors with pets seeking shelter, & bans horse slaughter for human consumption.

Today, @AppropsDems passed the Agriculture and Transportation, Housing, & Urban Development bills which include a lot of great funding for programs that will help thousands of South Floridians & Americans from coast to coast. Thread ⬇️
